84  asio::strand strand;

86  std::list<SendData> send_queue;
87 
88  void send_from_queue() {
89  strand.post([this]() {
90  asio::async_write(*socket, send_queue.begin()->send_stream->streambuf,
91  strand.wrap([this](const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
92  auto send_queued=send_queue.begin();
93  if(send_queued->callback)
94  send_queued->callback(ec);
95  if(!ec) {
96  send_queue.erase(send_queued);
97  if(send_queue.size()>0)
98  send_from_queue();
99  }
100  else
101  send_queue.clear();
102  }));
103  });
104  }

106  std::atomic<bool> closed;

108  void read_remote_endpoint_data() {
109  try {
110  remote_endpoint_address=socket->lowest_layer().remote_endpoint().address().to_string();
111  remote_endpoint_port=socket->lowest_layer().remote_endpoint().port();
112  }
113  catch(const std::exception& e) {
114  std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
115  }
116  }
117  };

149  void start() {
150  // TODO: remove when onopen, onmessage, etc is removed:
151  if(onopen)
152  on_open=onopen;
153  if(onmessage)
154  on_message=onmessage;
155  if(onclose)
156  on_close=onclose;
157  if(onerror)
158  on_error=onerror;
159 
160  if(!io_service) {
161  io_service=std::make_shared<asio::io_service>();
162  internal_io_service=true;
163  }
164 
165  if(io_service->stopped())
166  io_service->reset();
167 
168  if(!resolver)
169  resolver=std::unique_ptr<asio::ip::tcp::resolver>(new asio::ip::tcp::resolver(*io_service));
170 
171  connect();
172 
173  if(internal_io_service)
174  io_service->run();
175  }
176 
177  void stop() {
178  resolver->cancel();
179  if(internal_io_service)
180  io_service->stop();
181 
182  if(connection) {
183  error_code ec;
184  connection->socket->lowest_layer().shutdown(asio::ip::tcp::socket::shutdown_both, ec);
185  connection->socket->lowest_layer().close();
186  }
187  }

191  void send(const std::shared_ptr<SendStream> &message_stream, const std::function<void(const error_code&)>& callback=nullptr,
192  unsigned char fin_rsv_opcode=129) {
193  //Create mask
194  std::vector<unsigned char> mask;
195  mask.resize(4);
196  std::uniform_int_distribution<unsigned short> dist(0,255);
197  std::random_device rd;
198  for(int c=0;c<4;c++) {
199  mask[c]=static_cast<unsigned char>(dist(rd));
200  }
201 
202  auto send_stream = std::make_shared<SendStream>();
203 
204  size_t length=message_stream->size();
205 
206  send_stream->put(fin_rsv_opcode);
207  //masked (first length byte>=128)
208  if(length>=126) {
209  int num_bytes;
210  if(length>0xffff) {
211  num_bytes=8;
212  send_stream->put(static_cast<unsigned char>(127+128));
213  }
214  else {
215  num_bytes=2;
216  send_stream->put(static_cast<unsigned char>(126+128));
217  }
218 
219  for(int c=num_bytes-1;c>=0;c--) {
220  send_stream->put((static_cast<unsigned long long>(length) >> (8 * c)) % 256);
221  }
222  }
223  else
224  send_stream->put(static_cast<unsigned char>(length+128));
225 
226  for(int c=0;c<4;c++) {
227  send_stream->put(mask[c]);
228  }
229 
230  for(size_t c=0;c<length;c++) {
231  send_stream->put(message_stream->get()^mask[c%4]);
232  }
233 
234  connection->strand.post([this, send_stream, callback]() {
235  connection->send_queue.emplace_back(send_stream, callback);
236  if(connection->send_queue.size()==1)
237  connection->send_from_queue();
238  });
239  }
240 
241  void send_close(int status, const std::string& reason="", const std::function<void(const error_code&)>& callback=nullptr) {
242  //Send close only once (in case close is initiated by client)
243  if(connection->closed)
244  return;
245  connection->closed=true;
246 
247  auto send_stream=std::make_shared<SendStream>();
248 
249  send_stream->put(status>>8);
250  send_stream->put(status%256);
251 
252  *send_stream << reason;
253 
254  //fin_rsv_opcode=136: message close
255  send(send_stream, callback, 136);
256  }
257 
259  std::shared_ptr<asio::io_service> io_service;
260  protected:
261  const std::string ws_magic_string="258EAFA5-E914-47DA-95CA-C5AB0DC85B11";
262 
263  bool internal_io_service=false;
264  std::unique_ptr<asio::ip::tcp::resolver> resolver;
265 
266  std::string host;
267  unsigned short port;
268  std::string path;
269 
270  SocketClientBase(const std::string& host_port_path, unsigned short default_port) {
271  size_t host_end=host_port_path.find(':');
272  size_t host_port_end=host_port_path.find('/');
273  if(host_end==std::string::npos) {
274  host_end=host_port_end;
275  port=default_port;
276  }
277  else {
278  if(host_port_end==std::string::npos)
279  port=(unsigned short)stoul(host_port_path.substr(host_end+1));
280  else
281  port=(unsigned short)stoul(host_port_path.substr(host_end+1, host_port_end-(host_end+1)));
282  }
283  if(host_port_end==std::string::npos)
284  path="/";
285  else
286  path=host_port_path.substr(host_port_end);
287  if(host_end==std::string::npos)
288  host=host_port_path;
289  else
290  host=host_port_path.substr(0, host_end);
291  }
292 
293  virtual void connect()=0;
294 
295  void handshake() {
296  connection->read_remote_endpoint_data();
297 
298  auto write_buffer=std::make_shared<asio::streambuf>();
299 
300  std::ostream request(write_buffer.get());
301 
302  request << "GET " << path << " HTTP/1.1" << "\r\n";
303  request << "Host: " << host << "\r\n";
304  request << "Upgrade: websocket\r\n";
305  request << "Connection: Upgrade\r\n";
306 
307  //Make random 16-byte nonce
308  std::string nonce;
309  nonce.resize(16);
310  std::uniform_int_distribution<unsigned short> dist(0,255);
311  std::random_device rd;
312  for(int c=0;c<16;c++)
313  nonce[c]=static_cast<unsigned char>(dist(rd));
314 
315  auto nonce_base64=std::make_shared<std::string>(Crypto::Base64::encode(nonce));
316  request << "Sec-WebSocket-Key: " << *nonce_base64 << "\r\n";
317  request << "Sec-WebSocket-Version: 13\r\n";
318  request << "\r\n";
319 
320  asio::async_write(*connection->socket, *write_buffer,
321  [this, write_buffer, nonce_base64]
322  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
323  if(!ec) {
324  std::shared_ptr<Message> message(new Message());
325 
326  asio::async_read_until(*connection->socket, message->streambuf, "\r\n\r\n",
327  [this, message, nonce_base64]
328  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
329  if(!ec) {
330  parse_handshake(*message);
331  auto header_it=connection->header.find("Sec-WebSocket-Accept");
332  if(header_it!=connection->header.end() &&
333  Crypto::Base64::decode(header_it->second)==Crypto::sha1(*nonce_base64+ws_magic_string)) {
334  if(on_open)
335  on_open();
336  read_message(message);
337  }
338  else if(on_error)
339  on_error(make_error_code::make_error_code(errc::protocol_error));
340  }
341  else if(on_error)
342  on_error(ec);
343  });
344  }
345  else if(on_error)
346  on_error(ec);
347  });
348  }
349 
350  void parse_handshake(std::istream& stream) const {
351  std::string line;
352  getline(stream, line);
353  //Not parsing the first line
354 
355  getline(stream, line);
356  size_t param_end;
357  while((param_end=line.find(':'))!=std::string::npos) {
358  size_t value_start=param_end+1;
359  if((value_start)<line.size()) {
360  if(line[value_start]==' ')
361  value_start++;
362  if(value_start<line.size())
363  connection->header.emplace(line.substr(0, param_end), line.substr(value_start, line.size()-value_start-1));
364  }
365 
366  getline(stream, line);
367  }
368  }
369 
370  void read_message(const std::shared_ptr<Message> &message) {
371  asio::async_read(*connection->socket, message->streambuf, asio::transfer_exactly(2),
372  [this, message](const error_code& ec, size_t bytes_transferred) {
373  if(!ec) {
374  if(bytes_transferred==0) { //TODO: This might happen on server at least, might also happen here
375  read_message(message);
376  return;
377  }
378  std::vector<unsigned char> first_bytes;
379  first_bytes.resize(2);
380  message->read((char*)&first_bytes[0], 2);
381 
382  message->fin_rsv_opcode=first_bytes[0];
383 
384  //Close connection if masked message from server (protocol error)
385  if(first_bytes[1]>=128) {
386  const std::string reason("message from server masked");
387  auto kept_connection=connection;
388  send_close(1002, reason, [this, kept_connection](const error_code& /*ec*/) {});
389  if(on_close)
390  on_close(1002, reason);
391  return;
392  }
393 
394  size_t length=(first_bytes[1]&127);
395 
396  if(length==126) {
397  //2 next bytes is the size of content
398  asio::async_read(*connection->socket, message->streambuf, asio::transfer_exactly(2),
399  [this, message]
400  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
401  if(!ec) {
402  std::vector<unsigned char> length_bytes;
403  length_bytes.resize(2);
404  message->read((char*)&length_bytes[0], 2);
405 
406  size_t length=0;
407  int num_bytes=2;
408  for(int c=0;c<num_bytes;c++)
409  length+=length_bytes[c]<<(8*(num_bytes-1-c));
410 
411  message->length=length;
412  read_message_content(message);
413  }
414  else if(on_error)
415  on_error(ec);
416  });
417  }
418  else if(length==127) {
419  //8 next bytes is the size of content
420  asio::async_read(*connection->socket, message->streambuf, asio::transfer_exactly(8),
421  [this, message]
422  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
423  if(!ec) {
424  std::vector<unsigned char> length_bytes;
425  length_bytes.resize(8);
426  message->read((char*)&length_bytes[0], 8);
427 
428  size_t length=0;
429  int num_bytes=8;
430  for(int c=0;c<num_bytes;c++)
431  length+=length_bytes[c]<<(8*(num_bytes-1-c));
432 
433  message->length=length;
434  read_message_content(message);
435  }
436  else if(on_error)
437  on_error(ec);
438  });
439  }
440  else {
441  message->length=length;
442  read_message_content(message);
443  }
444  }
445  else if(on_error)
446  on_error(ec);
447  });
448  }
449 
450  void read_message_content(const std::shared_ptr<Message> &message) {
451  asio::async_read(*connection->socket, message->streambuf, asio::transfer_exactly(message->length),
452  [this, message]
453  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
454  if(!ec) {
455  //If connection close
456  if((message->fin_rsv_opcode&0x0f)==8) {
457  int status=0;
458  if(message->length>=2) {
459  unsigned char byte1=message->get();
460  unsigned char byte2=message->get();
461  status=(byte1<<8)+byte2;
462  }
463 
464  auto reason=message->string();
465  auto kept_connection=connection;
466  send_close(status, reason, [this, kept_connection](const error_code& /*ec*/) {});
467  if(on_close)
468  on_close(status, reason);
469  return;
470  }
471  //If ping
472  else if((message->fin_rsv_opcode&0x0f)==9) {
473  //send pong
474  auto empty_send_stream=std::make_shared<SendStream>();
475  send(empty_send_stream, nullptr, message->fin_rsv_opcode+1);
476  }
477  else if(on_message) {
478  on_message(message);
479  }
480 
481  //Next message
482  std::shared_ptr<Message> next_message(new Message());
483  read_message(next_message);
484  }
485  else if(on_error)
486  on_error(ec);
487  });
488  }
489  };
490 
491  template<class socket_type>
492  class SocketClient : public SocketClientBase<socket_type> {};
493 
494  typedef asio::ip::tcp::socket WS;
495 
496  template<>
497  class SocketClient<WS> : public SocketClientBase<WS> {
498  public:
499  SocketClient(const std::string& server_port_path) : SocketClientBase<WS>::SocketClientBase(server_port_path, 80) {};
500 
501  protected:
502  void connect() {
503  asio::ip::tcp::resolver::query query(host, std::to_string(port));
504 
505  resolver->async_resolve(query, [this]
506  (const error_code &ec, asio::ip::tcp::resolver::iterator it){
507  if(!ec) {
508  connection=std::shared_ptr<Connection>(new Connection(new WS(*io_service)));
509 
510  asio::async_connect(*connection->socket, it, [this]
511  (const error_code &ec, asio::ip::tcp::resolver::iterator /*it*/){
512  if(!ec) {
513  asio::ip::tcp::no_delay option(true);
514  connection->socket->set_option(option);
515 
516  handshake();
517  }
518  else if(on_error)
519  on_error(ec);
520  });
521  }
522  else if(on_error)
523  on_error(ec);
524  });
525  }
526  };
527  // TODO: remove when onopen, onmessage, etc is removed:
528  #ifdef __GNUC__
529  #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
530  #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
531  #pragma warning(pop)
532  #endif
533 }
